snippet: Circus acts have infused almost every kind of entertainment option in the city, and demand for circus-related services is surging.
abstract: Circus acts have infused almost every kind of entertainment option in New York City, and businesses with circus-related services are also seeing surge in demand.
lead_paragraph: Circus acts have infused almost every kind of entertainment option in the city, and demand for circus-related services is surging.
